Announcing Cosmic Resources

Vinayak Arora • Tue Aug 29 2023 •
#announcements#physics#notes#topicals

Good evening everyone, I am glad to announce CosmicResources. It is a repository for Physics A level notes (specifically for CAIE board), along with topical mcq questions and a Youtube channel for solving past paper questions. In the future I would like to expand the notes with my version of the lecture notes from the college I end up attending. If you want to contribute you can open a pull request on the site’s Github Page with the improvements/notes which you would like to submit.

You can contact me at vinayak@vinayakarora.xyz
